title: OnePlus is opting for an LCD instead of an AMOLED display for its next flagship
content:
After unveiling the OnePlus Ace in China last month, OnePlus is gearing up to add another model to the new lineup, dubbed the OnePlus Ace Racing Edition. The phone has been making rounds in leaks over the past few weeks, and now we have an official confirmation from OnePlus itself. The OnePlus Ace Space Edition

The post OnePlus is opting for an LCD instead of an AMOLED display for its next flagship appeared first on XDA.
description: The OnePlus Ace Space Edition will launch in China on May 17. It will pack an LCD 120Hz display and MediaTek Dimensity 8100-MAX chipset.
